title: BRIEF-Sydney Airport Holdings Says Aug International Passengers Were Up 2.0% Y-o-Y
text:
BRIEF-Sydney Airport Holdings Says Aug International Passengers Were Up 2.0% Y-o-Y

Stock Markets 41 minutes ago (Sep 20, 2019 04:41)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Sydney Airport Holdings Says Aug International Passengers Were Up 2.0% Y-o-Y Sept 20 (Reuters) - Sydney Airport Holdings Pty Ltd : * AUG INTERNATIONAL PASSENGERS WERE UP 2.0 PERCENT ON AUGUST 2018, AND 1.4 PERCENT YEAR TO DATE * AUG 2019 DOMESTIC PASSENGERS 2.3 MILLION, DOWN 1.3% * SYDNEY AIRPORT HOLDINGS SAYS STRONG MONTH FOR PASSENGERS FROM INDIA, WHICH WERE UP 14.5% ON AUGUST 2018, AND 8.1% YEAR TO DATE

BRIEF-Sydney Airport Holdings Says Aug International Passengers Were Up 2.0% Y-o-Y
